item.title: How to Use Ubus in Libremesh
item.description:
Introduction to Ubus in Libremesh for Beginners

Step 1: What is Ubus and Libremesh

Ubus is a powerful tool for managing mesh networks based on OpenWrt, such as Libremesh. It facilitates communication between system processes, providing a comprehensive information base. Learn more about Ubus and Libremesh. Since Ubus is a program installed within the router, you need to access the router’s terminal See how to do it here
